message.defaultText:
"I've never been this deep down into the labs.{W:500}
It almost feels abandoned."

"Wait{W:500}, did I just hear something?{W:500} Like maybe a giant block of text being forced into place to make me keep talking and make it suspiciously easy to detect how my mouth movements will work over the more extreme cases of long explanations?"
"Nah{W:500}, it couldn't be that!{W:500} That would be too convenient and it'd be silly for me to doubt the reality that I exist in."
"It's not like this is a video game or something!{W:500} That would be hard for anyone to swallow as a reality."

"Not many make it down here.{W:400}
Only the most reliable cleaners can handle the {C:3}{LK:1}first generator.{LK:E}{C:0}"

"It's a sign of how strong you are and how much they trust you.{W:500}
Four of us here means we're likely to be sent on a group cleaning mission in the {LK:1}first gate{LK:E} together."

"I sense something dark.{W:500}
Beware bad luck,{W:500} it's thick in the air around us."
"You're always rambling about 'bad luck'{W:500} - you make your own luck."

{C:2}{Y:I}{N:4} glares at {N:3}{W:500}, or at least I think he does.{W:500}
It's hard to tell with his face so shadowed under his hood.{Y:N}{C:0}
"Ignore my warning at your own peril,{W:400} I thought you wise enough to keep your wits about you."
"Ha!{W:500} My wits are like my guard boy,{W:500} always sharp and ready."

{C:2}{Y:I}We might all be experienced professionals,{W:500} but we're also independent and have our own personalities.{W:500} Still,{W:500} I have no doubts that if push came to shove they'd work together seamlessly.{Y:N}{C:0}

86C039730E058449F388E1B5D4D8B0367CA0.t: I guess I'm not really an easy to approach person...

D9A85FC2777F1546424AF299272CED05BF25.t: I guess I'm not really an easy to approach person...

28EC409A14EA994BC72B0302DAC0C9A88E91.t:
Tell you what, {w:100} tomorrow I'll bring a home made breakfast and we can get here twenty minutes early and eat it together and talk.
How does that sound?
